module OpenAPI.Errors
data OpenAPIErr
InvalidInfo :: InfoErr -> OpenAPIErr
InvalidPath :: PathErr -> OpenAPIErr
NoPaths :: OpenAPIErr
RepPaths :: OpenAPIErr
InvalidServer :: ServerErr -> OpenAPIErr
InvalidSecurity :: SecReqErr -> OpenAPIErr
data ServerVarErr
InvalidDefault :: ServerVarErr
InvalidEnum :: ServerVarErr
InvalidDescriptionSV :: ServerVarErr
data InfoErr
InvalidTitle :: InfoErr
InvalidDescriptionI :: InfoErr
InvalidToS :: InfoErr
InvalidContact :: ContactErr -> InfoErr
InvalidLicense :: LicenseErr -> InfoErr
InvalidVersion :: InfoErr
NoInfo :: InfoErr
data ContactErr
InvalidNameC :: ContactErr
InvalidURLC :: ContactErr
InvalidEmailC :: ContactErr
data LicenseErr
InvalidNameL :: LicenseErr
InvalidURLL :: LicenseErr
data PathErr
InvalidNameP :: PathErr
InvalidParameterP :: PathErr
InvalidSummaryP :: PathErr
InvalidDescriptionP :: PathErr
InvalidOperation :: OperationErr -> PathErr
InvalidServerP :: ServerErr -> PathErr
NoOperations :: PathErr
RepResponses :: PathErr
InvalidReferenceP :: PathErr
data OperationErr
InvalidTags :: OperationErr
InvalidSummaryO :: OperationErr
InvalidDocsO :: ExternalDocsErr -> OperationErr
InvalidIdO :: OperationErr
InvalidParameterO :: OperationErr
InvalidDescriptionO :: OperationErr
InvalidType :: OperationErr
NoResponses :: OperationErr
NoDefault :: OperationErr
InvalidResponses :: ResponsesErr -> OperationErr
InvalidServerO :: ServerErr -> OperationErr
InvalidSecurityO :: SecReqErr -> OperationErr
data ServerErr
InvalidURLS :: ServerErr
InvalidDescriptionS :: ServerErr
InvalidVarName :: ServerErr
InvalidServerVar :: ServerVarErr -> ServerErr
data ResponseErr
InvalidDescriptionR :: ResponseErr
InvalidHttpStatus :: ResponseErr
data SecReqErr
InvalidNameSecR :: SecReqErr
InvalidEmptyScope :: SecReqErr
data ReferenceErr
InvalidEmptyReference :: ReferenceErr
data ResponsesErr
InvalidResponse :: ResponseErr -> ResponsesErr
InvalidReferenceR :: ReferenceErr -> ResponsesErr
data ParameterErr
InvalidNameParameter :: ParameterErr
InvalidDescriptionParameter :: ParameterErr
InvalidSchemaParameter :: SchemaErr -> ParameterErr
InvalidSchemaRefParameter :: ReferenceErr -> ParameterErr
InvalidTypeParameter :: ParameterErr
data DiscriminatorErr
InvalidNameDiscriminator :: DiscriminatorErr
InvalidMappingDiscriminator :: DiscriminatorErr
data XmlErr
InvalidNameXml :: XmlErr
InvalidNameSpaceXml :: XmlErr
InvalidPrefixXml :: XmlErr
data ExternalDocsErr
InvalidDescriptionDocs :: ExternalDocsErr
InvalidURLDocs :: ExternalDocsErr
data SchemaErr
DiscriminatorError :: DiscriminatorErr -> SchemaErr
XmlError :: XmlErr -> SchemaErr
DocsError :: ExternalDocsErr -> SchemaErr
WriteAndReadOnly :: SchemaErr
InvalidExampleSchema :: SchemaErr
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Errors.ParameterErr
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Errors.ParameterErr

module OpenAPI.Types
newtype MkRef a b
MkRef :: Either a b -> MkRef a b
type Referenceable a = MkRef a Reference
data OpenAPI
OpenAPI :: Text -> Info -> [SecReq] -> [Path] -> [Server] -> OpenAPI
[_openAPI] :: OpenAPI -> Text
[_openInfo] :: OpenAPI -> Info
[_openSecurity] :: OpenAPI -> [SecReq]
[_openPaths] :: OpenAPI -> [Path]
[_openServers] :: OpenAPI -> [Server]
data Info
Info :: Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Contact -> Maybe License -> Text -> Info
[_infoTitle] :: Info -> Text
[_infoDescription] :: Info -> Maybe Text
[_infoTermsOfService] :: Info -> Maybe Text
[_infoContact] :: Info -> Maybe Contact
[_infoLicense] :: Info -> Maybe License
[_infoVersion] :: Info -> Text
data Path
Path :: Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> [Referenceable Parameter] -> [Server] -> [Operation] -> Path
[_pathName] :: Path -> Text
[_pathRef] :: Path -> Maybe Text
[_pathSummary] :: Path -> Maybe Text
[_pathDescription] :: Path -> Maybe Text
[_pathParameters] :: Path -> [Referenceable Parameter]
[_pathServers] :: Path -> [Server]
[_pathOperations] :: Path -> [Operation]
data Operation
Operation :: OperationType -> [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> HashMap Text Responses -> Maybe ExternalDocs -> Maybe Text -> [Referenceable Parameter] -> Bool -> [SecReq] -> [Server] -> Operation
[_operationType] :: Operation -> OperationType
[_operationTags] :: Operation -> [Text]
[_operationSummary] :: Operation -> Maybe Text
[_operationDescription] :: Operation -> Maybe Text
[_operationResponses] :: Operation -> HashMap Text Responses
[_operationDocs] :: Operation -> Maybe ExternalDocs
[_operationId] :: Operation -> Maybe Text
[_operationParameters] :: Operation -> [Referenceable Parameter]
[_operationDeprecated] :: Operation -> Bool
[_operationSecurity] :: Operation -> [SecReq]
[_operationServers] :: Operation -> [Server]
data Responses
ResponsesR :: Response -> Responses
ResponsesRef :: Reference -> Responses
data Response
Response :: Text -> Response
[_responseDescription] :: Response -> Text
data OperationType
GET :: OperationType
POST :: OperationType
PUT :: OperationType
DELETE :: OperationType
OPTIONS :: OperationType
HEAD :: OperationType
PATCH :: OperationType
TRACE :: OperationType
data Contact
Contact :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Contact
[_contactName] :: Contact -> Maybe Text
[_contactUrl] :: Contact -> Maybe Text
[_contactEmail] :: Contact -> Maybe Text
data License
License :: Text -> Maybe Text -> License
[_licenseName] :: License -> Text
[_licenseUrl] :: License -> Maybe Text
data Server
Server :: Text -> Maybe Text -> HashMap Text ServerVar -> Server
[_serverURL] :: Server -> Text
[_serverDescription] :: Server -> Maybe Text
[_serverVars] :: Server -> HashMap Text ServerVar
data ServerVar
ServerVar :: [Text] -> Text -> Maybe Text -> ServerVar
[_serverVEnum] :: ServerVar -> [Text]
[_serverVDefault] :: ServerVar -> Text
[_serverVDescription] :: ServerVar -> Maybe Text
data SecReq
SecReq :: Text -> [Text] -> SecReq
[_secReqName] :: SecReq -> Text
[_secReqScope] :: SecReq -> [Text]
data Reference
Reference :: Text -> Reference
[_refReference] :: Reference -> Text
data ParameterType
HEADER :: ParameterType
QUERY :: ParameterType
PATH :: ParameterType
COOKIE :: ParameterType
data Parameter
Parameter :: Text -> ParameterType -> Maybe Text -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Referenceable Schema -> Parameter
[_parameterName] :: Parameter -> Text
[_parameterIn] :: Parameter -> ParameterType
[_parameterDescription] :: Parameter -> Maybe Text
[_parameterRequired] :: Parameter -> Bool
[_parameterDeprecated] :: Parameter -> Bool
[_parameterAllowEmptyValue] :: Parameter -> Bool
[_parameterSchema] :: Parameter -> Referenceable Schema
data Schema
Schema :: Bool -> Discriminator -> Bool -> Bool -> Xml -> ExternalDocs -> Maybe Text -> Bool -> Schema
[_schemaNullabe] :: Schema -> Bool
[_schemaDiscriminator] :: Schema -> Discriminator
[_schemaReadOnly] :: Schema -> Bool
[_schemaWriteOnly] :: Schema -> Bool
[_schemaXml] :: Schema -> Xml
[_schemaExternalDocs] :: Schema -> ExternalDocs
[_schemaExample] :: Schema -> Maybe Text
[_schemaDeprecated] :: Schema -> Bool
data Discriminator
Discriminator :: Text -> HashMap Text Text -> Discriminator
[_discriminatorPropertyName] :: Discriminator -> Text
[_discriminatorMapping] :: Discriminator -> HashMap Text Text
data Xml
Xml :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Bool -> Bool -> Xml
[_xmlName] :: Xml -> Text
[_xmlNameSpace] :: Xml -> Text
[_xmlPrefix] :: Xml -> Text
[_xmlAttribute] :: Xml -> Bool
[_xmlWrapped] :: Xml -> Bool
data ExternalDocs
ExternalDocs :: Maybe Text -> Text -> ExternalDocs
[_externalDocsDescription] :: ExternalDocs -> Maybe Text
[_externalDocsURL] :: ExternalDocs -> Text
openServers :: Lens' OpenAPI [Server]
openSecurity :: Lens' OpenAPI [SecReq]
openPaths :: Lens' OpenAPI [Path]
openInfo :: Lens' OpenAPI Info
openAPI :: Lens' OpenAPI Text
infoVersion :: Lens' Info Text
infoTitle :: Lens' Info Text
infoTermsOfService :: Lens' Info (Maybe Text)
infoLicense :: Lens' Info (Maybe License)
infoDescription :: Lens' Info (Maybe Text)
infoContact :: Lens' Info (Maybe Contact)
pathSummary :: Lens' Path (Maybe Text)
pathServers :: Lens' Path [Server]
pathRef :: Lens' Path (Maybe Text)
pathParameters :: Lens' Path [Referenceable Parameter]
pathOperations :: Lens' Path [Operation]
pathName :: Lens' Path Text
pathDescription :: Lens' Path (Maybe Text)
operationType :: Lens' Operation OperationType
operationTags :: Lens' Operation [Text]
operationSummary :: Lens' Operation (Maybe Text)
operationServers :: Lens' Operation [Server]
operationSecurity :: Lens' Operation [SecReq]
operationResponses :: Lens' Operation (HashMap Text Responses)
operationParameters :: Lens' Operation [Referenceable Parameter]
operationId :: Lens' Operation (Maybe Text)
operationDocs :: Lens' Operation (Maybe ExternalDocs)
operationDescription :: Lens' Operation (Maybe Text)
operationDeprecated :: Lens' Operation Bool
responseDescription :: Lens' Response Text
contactUrl :: Lens' Contact (Maybe Text)
contactName :: Lens' Contact (Maybe Text)
contactEmail :: Lens' Contact (Maybe Text)
licenseUrl :: Lens' License (Maybe Text)
licenseName :: Lens' License Text
serverVEnum :: Lens' ServerVar [Text]
serverVDescription :: Lens' ServerVar (Maybe Text)
serverVDefault :: Lens' ServerVar Text
secReqScope :: Lens' SecReq [Text]
secReqName :: Lens' SecReq Text
refReference :: Lens' Reference Text
parameterSchema :: Lens' Parameter (Referenceable Schema)
parameterRequired :: Lens' Parameter Bool
parameterName :: Lens' Parameter Text
parameterIn :: Lens' Parameter ParameterType
parameterDescription :: Lens' Parameter (Maybe Text)
parameterDeprecated :: Lens' Parameter Bool
parameterAllowEmptyValue :: Lens' Parameter Bool
pairMaybes :: (ToJSON a, KeyValue b) => [Maybe a] -> [Text] -> [b]
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.Reference
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.SecReq
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.Response
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.Responses
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.Operation

instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.Info

instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.ServerVar
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.Server
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.Parameter
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.ParameterType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.Schema
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON OpenAPI.Types.Discriminator

instance (GHC.Show.Show a, GHC.Show.Show b) => GHC.Show.Show (OpenAPI.Types.MkRef a b)
instance (GHC.Classes.Eq a, GHC.Classes.Eq b) => GHC.Classes.Eq (OpenAPI.Types.MkRef a b)

module OpenAPI.Utils
foldBuilder :: Traversable t => (b -> c) -> (t a -> d) -> t (Either b a) -> Either c d
isValidEmail :: Text -> Bool
isValidURL :: Text -> Bool
verifyMaybe :: (a -> Bool) -> Maybe a -> Bool
emptyTxtsMaybe :: Maybe [Text] -> Bool
emptyTxts :: [Text] -> Bool
emptyTxt :: Text -> Bool
emptyTxtMaybe :: Maybe Text -> Bool
isValidVersionNumber :: Text -> Bool
noRepRecord :: Ord a => (t -> [b]) -> (b -> a) -> c -> t -> Either c t
apIfRight :: Traversable t => c -> (t a -> c) -> t (Either b a) -> c
maybeRight :: Maybe (Either b a) -> Maybe a
allDifferent :: Ord a => (b -> a) -> [b] -> Bool
cond :: (b -> Bool) -> (b -> c) -> (b -> c) -> b -> c
foldRefProds :: [MkRef (Either a b) (Either c d)] -> Maybe (Either a c)

module OpenAPI.Builders.XmlBuilder
configXml :: XmlBuilder -> Either XmlErr Xml
nameXml :: Text -> XmlBuilder
nameSpaceXml :: Text -> XmlBuilder
prefixXml :: Text -> XmlBuilder
attributeXml :: XmlBuilder
wrappedXml :: XmlBuilder
type XmlBuilder = State XmlB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.XmlBuilder.XmlB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.XmlBuilder.XmlB

module OpenAPI.Builders.ServerVarBuilder
configServerVar :: ServerVarBuilder -> Either ServerVarErr ServerVar
enumServerV :: Text -> ServerVarBuilder
defaultServerV :: Text -> ServerVarBuilder
descriptionServerV :: Text -> ServerVarBuilder
type ServerVarBuilder = State ServerVarB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.ServerVarBuilder.ServerVarB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.ServerVarBuilder.ServerVarB

module OpenAPI.Builders.ServerBuilder
configServer :: ServerBuilder -> Either ServerErr Server
urlServer :: Text -> ServerBuilder
varServer :: Text -> Either ServerVarErr ServerVar -> ServerBuilder
descriptionServer :: Text -> ServerBuilder
type ServerBuilder = State ServerB ()

module OpenAPI.Builders.SecReqBuilder
configSecReq :: SecReqBuilder -> Either SecReqErr SecReq
nameSecReq :: Text -> SecReqBuilder
scopeSeqReq :: Text -> SecReqBuilder
type SecReqBuilder = State SecReqB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.SecReqBuilder.SecReqB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.SecReqBuilder.SecReqB

module OpenAPI.Builders.SchemaBuilder
configSchema :: SchemaBuilder -> Either SchemaErr Schema
nullableSchema :: SchemaBuilder
discriminatorSchema :: Either DiscriminatorErr Discriminator -> SchemaBuilder
readOnlySchema :: SchemaBuilder
writeOnlySchema :: SchemaBuilder
xmlSchema :: Either XmlErr Xml -> SchemaBuilder
externalDocsSchema :: Either ExternalDocsErr ExternalDocs -> SchemaBuilder
exampleSchema :: Text -> SchemaBuilder
deprecatedSchema :: SchemaBuilder
type SchemaBuilder = State SchemaB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.SchemaBuilder.SchemaB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.SchemaBuilder.SchemaB

module OpenAPI.Builders.ResponseBuilder
configResponse :: ResponseBuilder -> Either ResponseErr Response
descriptionResponse :: Text -> ResponseBuilder
type ResponseBuilder = State ResponseB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.ResponseBuilder.ResponseB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.ResponseBuilder.ResponseB

module OpenAPI.Builders.ReferenceBuilder
configReference :: ReferenceBuilder -> Either ReferenceErr Reference
referenceRef :: Text -> ReferenceBuilder
type ReferenceBuilder = State ReferenceB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.ReferenceBuilder.ReferenceB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.ReferenceBuilder.ReferenceB

module OpenAPI.Builders.PathBuilder
configPath :: PathBuilder -> Either PathErr Path
namePath :: Text -> PathBuilder
summaryPath :: Text -> PathBuilder
descriptionPath :: Text -> PathBuilder
operationPath :: Either OperationErr Operation -> PathBuilder
refPath :: Text -> PathBuilder
serverPath :: Either ServerErr Server -> PathBuilder
parameterPathRef :: Either ReferenceErr Reference -> PathBuilder
parameterPath :: Either ParameterErr Parameter -> PathBuilder
type PathBuilder = State PathB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.PathBuilder.PathB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.PathBuilder.PathB

module OpenAPI.Builders.ParameterBuilder
configParameter :: ParameterBuilder -> Either ParameterErr Parameter
nameParameter :: Text -> ParameterBuilder
refParameter :: Text -> ParameterBuilder
requiredParameter :: ParameterBuilder
typeParameter :: ParameterType -> ParameterBuilder
deprecatedParameter :: ParameterBuilder
allowEmptyValueParameter :: ParameterBuilder
schemaParameter :: Either SchemaErr Schema -> ParameterBuilder
schemaRefParameter :: Either ReferenceErr Reference -> ParameterBuilder
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.ParameterBuilder.ParameterB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.ParameterBuilder.ParameterB

module OpenAPI.Builders.OperationBuilder
configOperation :: OperationBuilder -> Either OperationErr Operation
tagOperation :: Text -> OperationBuilder
summaryOperation :: Text -> OperationBuilder
descriptionOperation :: Text -> OperationBuilder
typeOperation :: OperationType -> OperationBuilder
statusResponseOperation :: Text -> Either ResponseErr Response -> OperationBuilder
statusResponseOperationRef :: Text -> Either ReferenceErr Reference -> OperationBuilder
defaultResponseOperation :: Either ResponseErr Response -> OperationBuilder
defaultResponseOperationRef :: Either ReferenceErr Reference -> OperationBuilder
docsOperation :: Either ExternalDocsErr ExternalDocs -> OperationBuilder
idOperation :: Text -> OperationBuilder
parameterOperation :: Either ParameterErr Parameter -> OperationBuilder
parameterRefOperation :: Either ReferenceErr Reference -> OperationBuilder
deprecatedOperation :: OperationBuilder
securityOperation :: Either SecReqErr SecReq -> OperationBuilder
serverOperation :: Either ServerErr Server -> OperationBuilder
type OperationBuilder = State OperationB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.OperationBuilder.OperationB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.OperationBuilder.OperationB

module OpenAPI.Builders.OpenAPIBuilder
config :: State OpenAPIB () -> Either OpenAPIErr OpenAPI
infoOpenAPI :: Either InfoErr Info -> OpenAPIBuilder
pathOpenAPI :: Either PathErr Path -> OpenAPIBuilder
serverOpenAPI :: Either ServerErr Server -> OpenAPIBuilder
securityOpenAPI :: Either SecReqErr SecReq -> OpenAPIBuilder
type OpenAPIBuilder = State OpenAPIB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.OpenAPIBuilder.OpenAPIB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.OpenAPIBuilder.OpenAPIB

module OpenAPI.Builders.LicenseBuilder
configLicense :: LicenseBuilder -> Either LicenseErr License
nameLicense :: Text -> LicenseBuilder
urlLicense :: Text -> LicenseBuilder
type LicenseBuilder = State LicenseB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.LicenseBuilder.LicenseB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.LicenseBuilder.LicenseB

module OpenAPI.Builders.InfoBuilder
configInfo :: InfoBuilder -> Either InfoErr Info
titleInfo :: Text -> InfoBuilder
descriptionInfo :: Text -> InfoBuilder
tosInfo :: Text -> InfoBuilder
contactInfo :: Either ContactErr Contact -> InfoBuilder
licenseInfo :: Either LicenseErr License -> InfoBuilder
versionInfo :: Text -> InfoBuilder
type InfoBuilder = State InfoB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.InfoBuilder.InfoB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.InfoBuilder.InfoB

module OpenAPI.Builders.ExternalDocsBuilder
configExternalDocs :: ExternalDocsBuilder -> Either ExternalDocsErr ExternalDocs
descriptionExternalDocs :: Text -> ExternalDocsBuilder
urlExternalDocs :: Text -> ExternalDocsBuilder
type ExternalDocsBuilder = State ExternalDocsB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.ExternalDocsBuilder.ExternalDocsB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.ExternalDocsBuilder.ExternalDocsB

module OpenAPI.Builders.DiscriminatorBuilder
configDiscriminator :: DiscriminatorBuilder -> Either DiscriminatorErr Discriminator
nameDiscriminator :: Text -> DiscriminatorBuilder
mappingDiscriminator :: Text -> Text -> DiscriminatorBuilder
type DiscriminatorBuilder = State DiscriminatorB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.DiscriminatorBuilder.DiscriminatorB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.DiscriminatorBuilder.DiscriminatorB

module OpenAPI.Builders.ContactBuilder
configContact :: ContactBuilder -> Either ContactErr Contact
nameContact :: Text -> ContactBuilder
urlContact :: Text -> ContactBuilder
emailContact :: Text -> ContactBuilder
type ContactBuilder = State ContactB ()
instance GHC.Show.Show OpenAPI.Builders.ContactBuilder.ContactB
instance GHC.Classes.Eq OpenAPI.Builders.ContactBuilder.ContactB

module OpenAPI.Builders
info :: InfoBuilder -> OpenAPIBuilder
license :: LicenseBuilder -> InfoBuilder
contact :: ContactBuilder -> InfoBuilder
path :: PathBuilder -> OpenAPIBuilder
operation :: OperationBuilder -> PathBuilder
defaultRes :: ResponseBuilder -> OperationBuilder
statusRes :: Text -> ResponseBuilder -> OperationBuilder

module OpenAPI
dumpConfig :: FilePath -> Either OpenAPIErr OpenAPI -> IO ()
